name: Upper Lower Split
description: 3-workout split with Upper 1, Lower 1, and Lower 2 for balanced muscle development

workouts.name: Upper 1
workouts.notes: Incline Machine Press, Pec Dec Flies, Neutral Grip Lat Pulldown, Chest Supported Rows, Overhead Press, Preacher Curls, Tricep Pushdowns, Hammer Curls

workouts.name: Lower 1
workouts.notes: Leg Press (Quads Targeted), Seated Leg Curls, Leg Extensions, Stiff Legged Deadlifts, Standing Calf Raises, Barbell Hip Thrusts

workouts.name: Lower 2
workouts.notes: Barbell Smith Squat, Seated Leg Curls, Leg Extensions, Glute Focused Leg Press, Abductors, Adductors, Standing Calf Raises

name: Push Pull Legs
description: Classic 3-day split focusing on pushing movements, pulling movements, and leg training

workouts.name: Push
workouts.notes: Incline Dumbbell Press, Pec Dec Flies, Dips, Tricep Pushdowns, Lateral Raises, Shoulder Press

workouts.name: Pull
workouts.notes: Lat Pulldowns, T-Bar Rows, Kelso Shrugs (Upright Row), Preacher Curls, Rear Delt Flies

workouts.name: Legs
workouts.notes: Barbell Smith Squat, Seated Leg Curls, Leg Extensions, Glute Focused Leg Press, Abductors, Adductors, Standing Calf Raises
